corrupted_champion.name: Corrupted Champion
corrupted_champion.description: A champion of the dark gods.

corrupted_champion_on_bike.name: Corrupted Champion on Bike
corrupted_champion_on_bike.description: A champion of the dark gods riding a combat bike.

corrupted_lord.name: Corrupted Lord
corrupted_lord.description: A lord of the dark gods.

corrupted_lord_on_bike.name: Corrupted Lord on Bike
corrupted_lord_on_bike.description: A lord of the dark gods riding a combat bike.

corrupted_engineer.name: Corrupted Engineer
corrupted_engineer.description: Twisted by the dark gods, dedicated to repairing corrupted machines.

corrupted_engineer_on_bike.name: Corrupted Engineer on Bike
corrupted_engineer_on_bike.description: Riding a combat bike, dedicated to repairing corrupted machines.

corrupted_psychic.name: Corrupted Psychic
corrupted_psychic.description: A potent psychic who has turned to the dark gods.

corrupted_psychic_on_bike.name: Corrupted Psychic on Bike
corrupted_psychic_on_bike.description: A potent psychic riding a combat bike.

demonic_champion.name: Demonic Champion
demonic_champion.description: A massive demon gifted by the dark gods.

lord_of_pestilence.name: Lord of Pestilence
lord_of_pestilence.description: A lord of death and decay.

pestilence_surgeon.name: Pestilence Surgeon
pestilence_surgeon.description: A combat medic who has spreads disease across the battlefield.

corrupted_priest.name: Corrupted Priest
corrupted_priest.description: A devotee of the dark gods who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

corrupted_priest_on_bike.name: Corrupted Priest on Bike
corrupted_priest_on_bike.description: A devotee of the dark gods on a combat bike who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

birdman_sorcerer.name: Birdman Sorcerer
birdman_sorcerer.description: A mutated half avian-half man sorcerer that leads demonic forces of magic.

cultist.name: Cultist
cultist.description: A lunatic who has sold their soul to the dark gods.

cultist_leader.name: Cultist Leader
cultist_leader.description: A lunatic leader who has sold their soul to the dark gods.

cultist_specialist.name: Cultist Specialist
cultist_specialist.description: A lunatic gunner who has sold their soul to the dark gods.

plague_walkers.name: Plague Walkers
plague_walkers.description: Unfortunate souls who have been mutated into walking undead.

birdman.name: Birdman
birdman.description: Mutated half avian-half man creature that fight with the forces of darkness to achieve their goals.

birdman_leader.name: Birdman Leader
birdman_leader.description: Mutated half avian-half man leader that fight with the forces of darkness to achieve their goals.

birdmen_disc_rider.name: Birdmen Disk Rider
birdmen_disc_rider.description: Exhalted birdman riding a psychic disk.

corrupted_marine.name: Corrupted Marine
corrupted_marine.description: A marine corrupted by the dark gods.

corrupted_marine_sergeant.name: Corrupted Marine Sergeant
corrupted_marine_sergeant.description: A marine leader corrupted by the dark gods.

corrupted_veterans.name: Corrupted Veteran
corrupted_veterans.description: Marine that has spent long service to the dark gods.

corrupted_veteran_leader.name: Corrupted Veteran Sergeant
corrupted_veteran_leader.description: Marine leader that has spent long service to the dark gods.

corrupted_devastator.name: Corrupted Devastator
corrupted_devastator.description: A highly trained corrupted marine leader armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

corrupted_heavy_devastator_sergeant.name: Corrupted Heavy Devastator Sergeant
corrupted_heavy_devastator_sergeant.description: A highly trained corrupted marine leader armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

corrupted_heavy_devastator.name: Corrupted Heavy Devastator
corrupted_heavy_devastator.description: A highly trained corrupted marine armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

pestilence_marine.name: Pestilence Marine
pestilence_marine.description: Marine corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_marine_leader.name: Pestilence Marine Sergeant
pestilence_marine_leader.description: Marine leader corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_marine_specialist.name: Pestilence Marine Specialist
pestilence_marine_specialist.description: Marine corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_destroyer.name: Pestilence Destroyer
pestilence_destroyer.description: Destroyer that is infected by the dark gods.

pestilence_destroyer_sergeant.name: Pestilence Destroyer Sergeant
pestilence_destroyer_sergeant.description: Destroyer leader that is infected by the dark gods.

pestilence_elite_destroyer.name: Pestilence Elite Destroyer
pestilence_elite_destroyer.description: Destroyer that is infected by the dark gods.

pestilence_elite_destroyer_sergeant.name: Pestilence Elite Destroyer Sergeant
pestilence_elite_destroyer_sergeant.description: Destroyer leader that is infected by the dark gods.

corrupted_berzerker.name: Corrupted Berzerker
corrupted_berzerker.description: Marine corrupted by the dark gods with rage.

corrupted_berzerker_sergeant.name: Corrupted Berzerker Sergeant
corrupted_berzerker_sergeant.description: Marine leader corrupted by the dark gods with rage.

recon_marine.name: Recon Marine
recon_marine.description: A lightly armed and armoured squad sent to scout and sow dissent

recon_marine_sergeant.name: Recon Marine Sergeant
recon_marine_sergeant.description: A lightly armed and armoured squad sent to scout and sow dissent

possessed_marine.name: Possessed Marine
possessed_marine.description: A corrupted marine that has been gifted with demonic mutations to aid them in battle.

possessed_marine_sergeant.name: Possessed Marine Sergeant
possessed_marine_sergeant.description: A corrupted marine leader that has been gifted with demonic mutations to aid them in battle.

greater_possessed_marine.name: Greater Possessed Marine
greater_possessed_marine.description: A corrupted marine that has been gifted with greater demonic mutations to aid them in battle.

demon_spawn.name: Demonic Spawn
demon_spawn.description: Horribly mutated being that runs rampant on the battlefield.

talon_raptor.name: Talon Raptors
talon_raptor.description: An elite corrupted marine jumping into the fray with a jetpack.

talon_raptor_sergeant.name: Talon Raptor Sergeant
talon_raptor_sergeant.description: An elite corrupted marine leader jumping into the fray with a jetpack.

corrupted_destoyer.name: Corrupted Destroyer
corrupted_destoyer.description: Destroyer that has been corrupted by the dark gods.

corrupted_destoyer_sergeant.name: Corrupted Destroyer Sergeant
corrupted_destoyer_sergeant.description: Destroyer leader that has been corrupted by the dark gods.

mutated_destoyer.name: Mutated Destroyer
mutated_destoyer.description: Destroyer that has been mutated by the dark gods.

corrupted_biker_sergeant.name: Corrupted Biker Sergeant
corrupted_biker_sergeant.description: Corrupted marine leader on combat bike.

psychic_marine.name: Psychic Marine
psychic_marine.description: Marine corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_marine_specialist.name: Psychic Marine Specialist
psychic_marine_specialist.description: Marine specialist corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_marine_heavy.name: Psychic Marine Heavy
psychic_marine_heavy.description: Marine gunner corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_marine_sergeant.name: Psychic Marine Sergeant
psychic_marine_sergeant.description: Marine leader corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_destroyer.name: Psychic Destroyer
psychic_destroyer.description: Deadly destroyer corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_destroyer_sergeant.name: Psychic Destroyer Sergeant
psychic_destroyer_sergeant.description: Deadly destroyer leader corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_veteran.name: Psychic Veteran
psychic_veteran.description: Elite marine corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_veteran_sergeant.name: Psychic Veteran Sergeant
psychic_veteran_sergeant.description: Elite marine leader corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

archmage_tactics.name: Arch-Psyker's Tactics
archmage_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly units with the Power special rule within 6".  Those units may reroll dice rolls of 9+ while using the Power ability until the end of the round.

archmage.name: Blessings of the Psyker God
archmage.description: When this unit casts the Shock Wave Power, double the number of hits it deals.

warding_staff.name: Warding
warding_staff.description: Enemy units suffer -1 to all Power(x) test while within 12" of this model.

hate.name: Hate
hate.flavor: Full with fury, corrupted marines can launch devastating close combat assaults.
hate.description: Use before an Infantry unit fights. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

never_surrender.name: Never Surrender
never_surrender.flavor: Marines have a will to survive and will fight on even when heavily injured.
never_surrender.description: Use when activating a unit. It may ignore any critical injuries it has sustained for this activation.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
fearless.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

legend_psychic_prowess.name: Psychic Prowess
legend_psychic_prowess.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Prowess(1).
legend_psychic_prowess.flavor: This hero has studied the magic arts and is adept at invoking powers.

legend_staff.name: The Warding Staff
legend_staff.description: Replace one Leader model's Energy Staff with The Warding Staff.
legend_staff.flavor: This staff has the power to absorb and stop psychic energy.

legend_flamethrower_pistol.name: The Psychic Inferno Pistol
legend_flamethrower_pistol.description: Replace one Hexed Flamethrower Pistol with The Psychic Inferno Pistol
legend_flamethrower_pistol.flavor: This pistol is enhanced with fiery magic immolating those at longer range.

legend_unholy_strength.name: Unholy Strength
legend_unholy_strength.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Unholy Strength.
legend_unholy_strength.flavor: Those that pray to the dark gods reveive blessings beyond human comprehension.

legend_war_veteran.name: War Veteran
legend_war_veteran.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Fearless.
legend_war_veteran.flavor: This hero has lived through so many battles that nothing can phase it anymore.

legend_accursed_rifle.name: Accursed Rifle
legend_accursed_rifle.description: Replace one Leader model's Marine Rifle with the Accursed Rifle.
legend_accursed_rifle.flavor: This ancient relic emits an aura of malice, shooting purified hatred.

sap_strength.name: Sap Strength
sap_strength.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -1 Strength until the end of the turn.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Save test.

balefire.name: Balefire
balefire.description: Target enemy unit within 24" take 3 hits with AP(1).

arcane_bolt.name: Arcane Bolt
arcane_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(4). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 3 hits with AP(3). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

arcane_barrage.name: Arcane Barrage
arcane_barrage.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 5 hits with AP(1). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

deadly_miasma.name: Deadly Miasma
deadly_miasma.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 6 hits with AP(2).

unholy_vitality.name: Unholy Vitality
unholy_vitality.description: Target friendly unit within 12" heals 1 lost wound.

spreading_plague.name: Spreading Plague
spreading_plague.description: Roll a d10 for every enemy unit within 12". On a 3 or less that unit takes 4 hits with AP(1).
